game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, the fabric of reality is threatened by an ancient evil known as The Devourer. Players take on the role of a Chronokeeper, tasked with traversing the timestream to repair anomalies and prevent the destruction of entire civilizations.
game.beginning: The game begins in a desolate, post-apocalyptic future where humanity has been all but eradicated by The Devourer's influence. As the last remaining Chronokeeper, players discover a mysterious artifact known as the Eternity Engine, which allows them to travel through time and sets them on their quest.
game.ending: After repairing countless timelines and defeating powerful enemies, players finally reach the source of the timestream's corruption: The Devourer. In an epic showdown, the Chronokeeper must harness the power of the Eternity Engine to defeat The Devourer and restore balance to the fabric of time, saving humanity from extinction.
